Return Data.performance_summary: Analysis of Q1 2024 performance shows strong growth in Electronics and Home & Garden categories with 15% increase in conversion rates. Fashion and Sports categories show declining click-through rates requiring attention. Overall taxonomy structure performs well with 78% average conversion rate across all categories.
optimization_recommendations: Merge low-performing Fashion subcategories to improve discoverability
Add trending keywords to Sports category descriptions
Restructure Toys taxonomy to highlight age-appropriate products
Create seasonal promotional categories for better visibility
Implement cross-category recommendations for related products
